reviews.text:
We are so grateful to Dr Hsu for the great care provided to our child with hand, foot, and mouth disease. From the very first visit, doctor on duty was thorough, and reassuring. They all took the time to explain everything clearly, answered all of our questions.

Staff Pat was friendly, efficient, and professional. She made the check-in process smooth and easy.

Thank you to the entire team for making our visit so pleasant!

Friendly reception by Patricia and the team of  doctors,  clean and cosy environment,  first met Dr Michael wong for my vertigo and headache besides the consultation he advised to go for medical on health sg which come with  great benefits and since than I have been on the programme, Dr Nicholas Leong have been attending my wife health with good advice,  Their professionalism as a doctor attending to patients need and very patience listening to our complaints with a smile and no rush is what me and my wife appreciate as senior citizens,  thank you and definitely would recommend this clinic which suits seniors need
Whenever I'm unwell, I always go to Union clinic. Dr Wong is very caring and pays great attention to all my concerns. The clinic isvery clean. They have many equipments so you can do tests in house

I'm glad I visited this clinic. Ms Tan at the reception was very patient and helpful in checking my company insurance coverage. Dr Wong took his time to find out my symptoms before prescribing treatment. Clinic is very clean. All in all, a wonderful experience.

Dr Nicholas is very knowledgeable and patient in his consultation, does not rush and takes time to listen. Ms Pat is super helpful (there were issues with the insurance portal) and went above and beyond to link up with the vendor to check. Thank you!
